A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Completely trashes canon and the extended universe. \nAdmiral Holdo is the true villain of this movie guiding the resistance into its demise through bad leadership and distrust in her people. When she finally realizes what she has done she kills herself. She wins the race for worst leadership against a manic-depressive kid and a strategic moron as her adversaries.\nI am sorry\, is this supposed to be good writing?
